items.sentence: Tom used to do that better than he does now.
Tom used to hang out with Mary all the time.
I have a friend waiting for me in the lobby.
I have a lot of things to do this afternoon.
I have absolutely no idea what Tom is doing.
Are you spending enough time with your kids?
Are you sure this is the right way to do it?
Are you sure you can drive a truck this big?
She told him that she believed in astrology.
I strongly suggest you follow Tom\'s advice.
I suppose I\'ll get used to this eventually.
Christmas is a good time to market new toys.
I don\'t know how to tell Tom this bad news.
I don\'t know the first thing about fishing.
I don\'t know the reason he is absent today.
I don\'t know what the consequences will be.
This afternoon\'s meeting has been canceled.
Have you told anyone what your real name is?
He added a little sugar and milk to his tea.
How many people were killed in the accident?
